nodes.text: New Character Templates: A Supplement to Star Wars' Mos Eisley Galaxy Guide

New Character Templates: A Supplement to Star Wars' Mos Eisley Galaxy Guide was a roleplaying adventure written by Martin Wixted for Challenge 73 in June 1993. It was compatible with the West End Games role-playing system and written for its second edition, as an addendum for Galaxy Guide 7: Mos Eisley.

It included the stats for player characters, including "Gentle Gamorrean", "Glib scoundrel", "Hopeful trash collector", "Rueful militia member", "Unsophisticated syndicate stooge" and "Yearning farmhand". It also included the stats of the starship Vengeful Sandstorm.
The images illustrating the templates depict a very liberal interpretation of the alien species mentioned in the text.
